events.message: I just received my order and unfortunately the screen is cracked and does not respond to touch at all.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to damage and faulty screen responsiveness.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the case regarding the defective screen reported by the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the cracked screen issue. I’m here to help get this resolved for you as soon as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and confirm if the packaging was damaged on arrival?
Attached are the photos showing the cracked screen. The box looked fine on delivery, so I believe it was defective before shipping.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement unit immediately and provide a prepaid label for you to return the defective item.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the hassle-free replacement offer.
The replacement order has been processed, and shipping details will be sent shortly. Your issue is now resolved.
We wanted to check in to ensure the replacement device arrived in good condition and is functioning as expected.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and works perfectly. Thank you for your excellent support.
We’re glad everything is sorted. Closing the case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
